items.sentence: Tom is one of the best surfers on the West Coast.
I can\'t send you all the files at the same time.
Tom and Mary only speak French to their children.
Tom and Mary sat next to each other on the train.
Tom and Mary walked down the path, holding hands.
Tom and Mary watched the sun rise over the ocean.
Tom asked Mary the same question he had asked me.
Tom said he wouldn\'t mind sleeping on the floor.
How are we going to get enough food for everyone?
How could I not be grateful for this opportunity?
How did you know I was going to ask you for that?
Tom doesn\'t usually stop if the light is yellow.
Are you sure it was Tom who told Mary to do that?
I feel more alert after drinking a cup of coffee.
I found it impossible to get in contact with him.
I gathered from what she said that she liked him.
I had known her for ten years when I married her.
We can\'t even be certain that it was Tom we saw.
We can\'t open this envelope until Tom gets here.
Tom finished his drink and asked for another one.
